rev.comment: link first instance of the term
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes
Clean up , Typos fixed: disagrement → disagreement, using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
add info on methionine as a possible antidote.
mv sentence up one level to other paragraph for clarity.
add reference for most calls to poison control centers in US.
add reference for liver failure; rephrase sentence to agree with literature (should fix the citation needed tag).
/* Comparison with NSAIDs */ very little anti-inflammatory -> relatively little; consistency with what is written above
add info & reference on 1955 marketing of tylenol.
/* See also */ already in the text, doesn't belong in See also
/* Available forms */ [[WP:UNITS]], this section needs [[WP:MOSBOLD]] cleanup
/* Comparison with NSAIDs */ misc ref cleanup
/* Acetylcysteine */ ref cleanup, [[WP:MOSNUM]], [[WP:UNITS]].[[WP:MOSLINK]], [[WP:CONTEXT]], this section is uncited
/* See also */ linked in article, not needed in See also
/* Effects on animals */ [[WP:MOSBOLD]] and ref cleanup
/* Toxicity */ adding in lieu of uncited statement in Metabolism section
/* Mechanism of action */ corrected description of anti-inflammatory activity; per Rang: Pharmacology, 5 ed.
/* Synthesis */ nobody really calls it ethanoic anhydride
/* External links */ Added a link to Wikitox
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes
/* Metabolism */ +{{cn}}; replaced with paracetamol for consistency
